name: Cartier Tank Solo Watch
description: Classic rectangular watch with Roman numerals and blue steel hands. Timeless elegance.
care_instructions: Water resistant to 30m. Service every 3-4 years.
story: Created in 1917, inspired by the Renault tanks of WWI.
meta_title: Cartier Tank Solo Watch - Classic Luxury Timepiece
meta_description: Iconic Cartier Tank Solo with Roman numerals and steel case

name: Cartier Panthère de Cartier Watch
description: Elegant square watch with integrated bracelet. A symbol of Cartier's feline spirit.
care_instructions: Professional servicing recommended. Avoid magnetic fields.
story: The panther has been Cartier's signature since 1914.
meta_title: Cartier Panthère Watch - Gold Luxury Timepiece
meta_description: Cartier Panthère watch in 18k yellow gold with integrated bracelet

name: Cartier Ballon Bleu Watch
description: Distinctive round watch with blue sapphire crown guard. Modern sophistication.
care_instructions: Water resistant to 30m. Regular maintenance advised.
story: Launched in 2007, featuring the floating crown design.
meta_title: Cartier Ballon Bleu Watch - Contemporary Luxury Watch
meta_description: Cartier Ballon Bleu with sapphire crown guard and blue leather strap

name: Cartier Santos Watch
description: Aviation-inspired square watch with exposed screws. A pioneering design.
care_instructions: Water resistant to 100m. Annual water resistance check.
story: Created in 1904 for aviator Alberto Santos-Dumont.
meta_title: Cartier Santos Watch - Aviation Luxury Timepiece
meta_description: Cartier Santos watch with exposed screws and two-tone design

name: Cartier Juste un Clou Bracelet
description: Bold nail-inspired bracelet in 18k rose gold. Modern luxury statement.
care_instructions: Professional cleaning recommended. Store in jewelry box.
story: Created in 1971 New York, transforming a nail into luxury jewelry.
meta_title: Cartier Juste un Clou Bracelet - Rose Gold Jewelry
meta_description: Cartier nail-inspired bracelet in 18k rose gold
